title: Boutique Coral Coast Escape
description: Escape to Australia’s Coral Coast with a stay at The Gerald Apartment Hotel. Located in the seaside city of Geraldton, this luxe boutique accommodation features a rooftop bar and sits right in the CBD, near restaurants and shops, but just a two-minute walk from the seafront esplanade and the beach. Your stay includes daily continental breakfast for two, one complimentary mini-bar and the choice of either return airport transfers OR a free bottle of wine when dining in the hotel’s restaurant.

title: Boutique Geraldton Coastal Escape
description:
Inhale the fresh coastal breeze on a relaxing escape to Western Australia's Coral Coast and the Gerald Apartment Hotel, a stylish boutique retreat rising above the seaside city of Geraldton. Right in the heart of the CBD, this luxe hotel features tastefully designed rooms enriched with splashes of colour from curated artwork, high-tech entertainment and superfast Wi-Fi, and is crowned with a rooftop bar with sensational views to match a deluxe menu of hand-crafted drinks and chef-prepared 'street food'.

Take a two-minute stroll to the seafront esplanade and beach, embark on an adventure to the Abrolhos Islands or splash out at one of the many nearby restaurants serving Australia's prized rock lobster.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Celebrate on arrival with a delicious cheese platter
- Toast to your escape with a complimentary bottle of wine
- Relax until the very last moment with guaranteed late 12pm checkout

**Longer stay bonus:** Stay three nights or more and enjoy A$25 drink and dining credit per room to spend at the hotel's incredible rooftop bar - Old Man & The Sea - or the intimate Bob's Boutique Bar

**Travelling with friends or family?** Choose the Group Studio or Two-Bedroom Apartment Upgrades to accommodate up to four guests.

**Balcony upgrades:** Inhale the fresh coastal breeze and admire harbour views from the luxury of your own private balcony.

title: Boutique Geraldton Coastal Escape
description:
Inhale the fresh coastal breeze on a relaxing escape to Western Australia's Coral Coast at the Gerald Apartment Hotel, a stylish boutique retreat overlooking the seaside city of Geraldton.

Right in the heart of the CBD, this luxe hotel - stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2021 award - features tastefully designed rooms enriched with splashes of colour from curated artwork and is crowned with a rooftop bar with sensational views and a deluxe menu of hand-crafted drinks and chef-prepared street food. Take a two-minute stroll to the seafront esplanade and beach, embark on an adventure to the Abrolhos Islands, or splash out at one of the many nearby restaurants serving Australia's prized rock lobster

title: Central Geraldton Self-Contained Apartment Escape on Batavia Coast Marina with Pool & BBQ Facilities
description:
Experience the coastal charm of Western Australia with a cosy apartment stay in the heart of Geraldton. This contemporary retreat is ideally located moments from the Batavia Coast Marina and boardwalk, with easy access to the region's pristine beaches, historic sites and vibrant dining scene. Explore the captivating HMAS Sydney II Memorial, visit the Geraldton Regional Art Gallery, or savour fresh seafood at local eateries.

The resort's spacious apartments offer everything you need for a comfortable vacation. Be sure to take advantage of the onsite barbecue area, the heated pool or the spa to unwind after a day of exploring the surrounding area.
